duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, analyze, procure, manufacture, and test control and power electronics modules and assemblies.
Lead and execute the validation and qualification of new electrical equipment, components, and assemblies, with focus on mechanical and thermal performance, and electrical functional tests.
Perform detailed thermal analysis of electronics cooling, predicting device operating temperatures through simulation.
Perform finite element stress analysis on electrical panels based on defined load cases.
Prepare and present technical data to internal and external customers.
Participate on teams assigned to address specific organizational initiatives.
Prepare invention disclosures to protect the technology that provides a competitive advantage to the business.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering or related engineering field (MS Mechanical Engineering degree preferred)
